author: malcolm
msg: Fix diff_tests 32 (repos-wc diff showing added entries with props).
When performing a wc->repos diff on an added file, include the BASE->repos
propchanges in the file_added() callback.
(WORKING->repos diffs should obviously report the WORKING->repos
propchanges instead).
* subversion/libsvn_wc/diff.c
(close_file): Pass the BASE->repos propchanges (which will be the
propchanges from an empty hash, since the file does not exist
in BASE), together with an empty hash to represent the original
properties, to the svn_wc_diff_callbacks2_t file_added() callback.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/diff_tests.py
(test_list): Unmark test diff_repos_wc_add_with_props as XFail.

author: maxb
msg: * STATUS: Nominate r18114.

author: maxb
msg: * tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py (Config._prep_groups):
Fix bug: named substitutions gathered from defaults.for_repos were being
ignored for sections which contained a specific for_repos option.

author: malcolm
msg: Continue work on fixing diff_tests 32 (repos-wc diff showing added
entries with props).
When performing a repos->wc diff, if the BASE->repos diff reported by the
server indicates that a directory has been deleted (and so therefore we
must report the addition of a directory currently in the wc), reconstruct
the propchanges necessary to create the current WORKING properties,
and pass them to the dir_props_changed() callback.
Like r18098, this is incorrect for repos->BASE diffs, but the whole
handling of directories reported as deleted during repos->BASE diffs is
currently disabled due to an earlier check in directory_elements_diff()
(the function responsible for reporting both local BASE->WORKING diffs
and for faking added directories for repos->WORKING diffs).
[The diff is easier to follow with 'diff -w'; we're just adding a new
case before the 'if (modified)' condition, not changing it.]
* subversion/libsvn_wc/diff.c
(directory_elements_diff): Before checking whether a directory has local
property modifications, first check whether we are faking the addition
of the directory (true only if we're doing a repos->WORKING diff,
and the directory doesn't exist in the repos).  If so, fetch the
current WORKING properties and determine the changes necessary to
create them from scratch.  Report the changes (together with an empty
property hash) during the svn_wc_diff_callbacks2_t dir_props_changed()
callback.

author: pburba
msg: Merge r17717:18091 from svn/trunk to svn/branches/ebcdic/trunk.
